name: study-progress-subgraph
description: Study attempts + study set anchors subgraph on Tempo Moderato â€” dotheaven

scripts.build:tempo: graph codegen subgraph.tempo.yaml && graph build subgraph.tempo.yaml

scripts.deploy:tempo:local: graph deploy --version-label ${VERSION_LABEL:-local} --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001 dotheaven/study-progress-tempo subgraph.tempo.local.yaml
